评论详情: I just live this lounge set, great for lounge at home or running errands! Material is perfect thickness, super soft and great quality. Feels very high end! I am buying another color! Perfect fit! Great price too!  Size small

评论概述: Slightly Long but Really Well Made
评论详情: I usually don't buy clothes from Amazon but was looking for a nice lounge set for the home that I easily run errands in and still look put together. I purchased the both Black and Olive. So far, I have only tried the black one on. The material is amazing, so soft and comfortable. Very clean sleek design. I'm just slightly over 5'2" and my weight right now is fluctuating between 157 to 162. I ordered a size medium and fits perfectly except that the length of the pants is just a tad bit long. However, i wouldn't mind this lounging around the house. if you are wearing shoes with more of a platform like some Hoka shoes then it should be fine. The olive color is beautiful but yet to try it on.
Nice material, nice fit, good looking outfit. I wish the wide legs weren’t sooo WIDE. I debated on sending this back but it’s comfortable so I’m keeping it.

I love the fabric in this sweatsuit.  It is so soft and comfortable.  It has a very nice color(green) and did not fade or shrink after washing and drying.  It seems very well made.  The legs are very wide, however.  Just keep that in mind.  I am 5'5" , 120 lb. and the small fits me.

I love the fabric and cut and everything about this set EXCEPT that the waist is too tight! I do not understand why the manufacturer would make the waist so small when it is elastic and has a drawstring for adjustment. Otherwise, the medium fits perfectly. I ordered a large to see if it would fit better, but it is too baggy overall (although the waist on the large fits more comfortably, it is still too snug for athleisure). Was hoping to wear these for travel, but the waist is a problem. For reference, I am 153 pounds and 5 ft 5 1/2 in tall. This set might be best for those with a tiny waist or those who have not had children.

I love this outfit! I can’t say how it will hold up over time, but it seems high quality. The material feels very soft and comfortable. I would say that the material is medium thickness, warm enough to wear out and about shopping in the winter if you don’t live in a really cold climate. Definitely appropriate for the fall too.  It seems to be made a little oversized in a good, modern way. The pants are fitted at the waist and hips but flare out at the bottom. The top sits just below the waist line, short enough to have that modern feel but not so short that your stomach is exposed when you raise your arms. My only negative is that the top I ordered doesn’t have pockets. However, the description doesn’t claim that it has pockets, I guess I just assumed that it would.

评论概述: a cute upgrade to my sweat sets
评论详情: the quality of this set is SO much better than I usually find on Amazon! I'm a big fan of this set; I prioritize comfort in my wardrobe and being able to wear something that's not only cute but cozy is an instant win in my book! i got the hot pink set to wear to a pink-themed birthday party and while the color is out of my comfort zone, I actually really love how rich and saturated the hue is.  the material is thick and has a silky smoothness on both the inside and outside. occasionally one of my kitten's claws will get caught in it and leave a little snag, but for the most part i've been able to work the snags back into the weave.  i got the XXL and i'm around 5'2" and 230lbs. i carry most of my weight around the bottom half, and despite that I've found that both halves of the set fit me really well! the sleeves of the top are perfectly baggy; the body of the top has a lot of room for my chest; the waistband on the top is a little too short to pull down as far as I usually like it and it's a bit tight on my hips, but it flips up nicely to where the small of my waist is and gives the top a flattering flouncy shape. the pants have the perfect boot-cut shape for wearing with chunky slippers. they're not baggy at the torso-covering, but rather more fitted; despite this, I think they still look really flattering (and my lower stomach is usually the part of my body i'm the most self-conscious about concealing).  honestly, i'm planning on buying this set in a few more colors. would absolutely recommend!

Perfect knock off of the spanx air essentials. The fabric is not quite as soft but the weight and feel of it are spot on. The look is spot on too. I am 5’4 120lbs and the small (Amazon recommended size) was a perfect fit. EXCEPT the pants were far too long. I would either have to let them drag or wear heels. I’m not sure if the thick fabric could be hemmed. If they come up with a petite pant size, I would absolutely buy these over spanx. The pants have POCKETS which it absolutely blows my mind that the spanx ones don’t. How do people function without pockets? If you’re debating spanx but pausing on the price tag or lack of pockets, get these first. If you’re 5’4 or shorter though, the spanx petite pants size small fit me perfectly in size and length.

I got this as a dupe for SPANXX. I find the price to be much better of course. I have used this a total of maybe 7 times - all for trips, both long and short haul.  The first 2 times, it was fantastic. The pants were as seen on the model. But after washing, the pants definitely shrunk and so now I have short a-line pants which is not the look I was going for at all.  That said, I wore this when pregnant and they were so comfortable and covered my bump. People could not even tell I was pregnant. The material is so soft and breathable. I also like the style- can be dressed up or down and perfect for the cold plane rides.

Wanted to love this set and make it a go to but should have listened to my niece who was disillusioned by her more expensive version. I’m having same issues.  Pros: comfortable, perfect for travel, buttery feel  Cons: fabric holds “stains” way too easily, even just water droplets. They do not dissipate as they normally would on other fabric. Very strange and my niece had the same complaint. Less than ideal during travel as the areas where water had landed while washing my hands remained noticeable. I bought a lighter and darker color. I would stick to dark colors that don’t show as badly. The “stained” areas came out in the wash but not ideal that water or water and soap alone should cause such a lasting mark. See the other review where someone wore hers with wet hair. Also seems to pill too quickly and had a few loose threads after one wash on gentle.  I don’t regret the purchase as they were perfect for my airplane travel but I don’t hold much hope in how they’ll stand up to the test of time and regular wear and tear.

评论概述: Very comfortable, great colors and price
评论详情: I love these outfits! They are great casual outfits that I can wear with sneakers, UGGS or Crocs. Beautiful colors. They are great for shopping, working from home and travel. I have 4 sets. I’ve also bought as Christmas gifts for my family and for a sick auntie who is bound to her wheelchair and wanted to be cute for visitors. They wash and wear very well. They aren’t the same as the SPANX Air Essentials that I own but they are a close second, especially for the price.

This is a great dupe for the Spanx set! I have both. Here's the pros/cons of each. Spanx Pros-even softer, feels heavenly. Better fit for my body. I'm 5'4", 107 lbs and the Spanx XS fits perfectly, including the length of the pants.  Cons-no pockets, and the price.  This set pros-pockets, lower price. Cons-not quite as soft, but still fantastic! Pants are just a tad long on me. Not bad, but about an inch too long.  Overall, for the price difference, this set is a big winner!!!!  I ordered the same size and they're similar, with this set running a tad bigger overall.

I love the material, it's very soft and a bit heavy. I am 5'4 165 lbs and I'm usually a 10 in pants. So I ordered a M based on most reviews. I should've sized up to an L and given a bit more room in the waist area. The blouse is a bit too short for my liking. So, I will wear the outfit separately.. because I don't like how it looks together. The material doesn't have a smell at all just in case anyone was wondering.

评论概述: Great dupe, but could be a little longer
评论详情: Great quality fabric, excellent colors, very similar to the expensive air essentials fabric and fit, however sending back because of length. If they could add about 2 inches to the length I would buy in several colors. I’m 5’9” for reference and typically between a M and L. Fit was true to size.
The sweatsuit itself is really well-made. It's soft and thick enough- not overly, but definitely not thin. I'm 5'3" and 134 lbs. The small fit fine but was a little shorter than I expected.

This is a very well made set unfortunately the pants were to short. I am 5’7 1/2 for reference. I ordered a medium which fit well, but I opted to return the set because the pants were too short. Wish you could by the pants in a long.

As others have reported, the material is soft and comfortable. I purchased the olive color one. The green looked great, the material was soft and conformable, and I loved wearing. My one annoyance - which it does not warrant a less of a star - is that you have to let it air dry. I will be getting other colors!
Great for doing so many things I wear it all the time. The fabric is great thick. Well made. Color is fun a bright.

This matching set is the softest fabric. Very silky like. This set fits great and I got a medium.  I am 5’6, 135 lbs and curvy in my legs. I usually am a small but will do mediums in sweats. The pants are loose but not too loose and the top is perfect for an oversized fit. They are just right on the length so would not be great if your much taller for the pants. Overall, they feel like a luxury brand.

I got this on sale Cyber Monday. It is a dupe for a Spanx top and bottom. Maybe not as nice but pretty nice and way cheaper.  I got XL and pants a bit short on me 5'9 but still wearable. I really like the top and have work that with a skirt.

If you are questioning putting this in your cart, go for it. I bought two sets, one in the burgundy for my grandmother, and a pink set for my mother. Not only was the set made of quality material, it fit true to size, and the color is radiant. Both of them loved their gifts and even went back to purchase other colors.

At first glance it felt weird to see myself wearing this fit. But i gave it a another try and i style it the way the models do in the photos - this is key i also ordered a size up from my normal size for the extra baggage & style.
Only gave it 4 starts because the color sent was wrong. I ordered the brown which is like a Jude color but was sent the dark brown coffee color. Still cute though!

Love everything about this, I bought it for travel and it was great! One thing to note....they need to put pockets on the top! I'm constantly trying to put my hands in the pockets and there aren't any. There are pockets in the pants though! Still love it!

评论概述: I own 3 - love them but they are not created equal
评论详情: I own 3 of these in black, grey and navy. The navy is a completely different fabric and quality. The black and grey are a heavier fabric that feels and drapes like more expensive sets. The originals wash well in gentle cycle with drying rack. The last one in navy is cheaper fabric, lighter weight. I am going to keep it and see how it compares after wearing for a full travel day. These outfits are great for air travel, I only wish the quality was guaranteed to be the same for every color.

Received package yesterday. It was wrapped in clear package. Very soft to the touch. I washed it in warm water in the washing machine. It is very comfortable. This shall be my go-to, when I return from work, after a hot shower. I will probably order a white set. The set isn't super thick, however it's not flimsy. Something to wear when curled on the sofa with a good book and some sangria. The pants has pockets, not the top.  I wear a medium. I'm 5'4 between 155-160 lbs.  Update:I've washed at least twice. No shrinkage. No pilling. I must order again. This is my inside lounging outfit. I need some for stepping outside.

Material is high quality and amazing! Some reviews said waist is tight and size up-I 100% DISAGREE. I bought a medium but definitely need a small. The shirt is loose (wearable but loose) and the waist band is not nearly tight enough. For reference I’m 5’4 128-130# and 4 in pants. I’m keeping it bc I already took tags off 😩 but I’ll get a small in other colors for sure

If you don’t want to look like you are wearing your daughter’s casual warmup, This is for you.  I carry my weight through my hips and thighs like most women. And the medium fit me perfect. Great for traveling and you won’t look like you were dragged through the mud at the end of the day.

评论概述: Luxury feel without luxury price tag
评论详情: I have ordered 5 of these sets. They fit great for all but one (she prefers first a little more fitted so she would have needed to size down one in the pants, but the top for her perfectly). They are so soft to the touch. This coordinating set makes you look like you have your stuff together while being so effortless.
Que producto tan bueno se lo he comprado a mi mamá y mi tía  donde se ponen la sudadera q es muy elegante y vestidora ya les he comprado de varios colores. Súper recomendada
This set is really great quality and so comfortable! I’m 5ft 7in and 173lbs and got a large and it fits perfect and is a great length! Would definitely buy this in more colors!
This is so similar to the Spanx set (which I own so I know) but better because it has pockets! I’m 5’7” 160lbs and the medium is perfect. Pants length is great too!
Very cute and comfy outfit. Material is not too thin and not too thick. Washes well.

评论概述: runs long/tall and gets pilled after a few washes
评论详情: comfy and cute, but only for the first few washes. Then the fabric gets pilled.

评论概述: It Fits and it’s not Too Long!
评论详情: Such a comfortable outfit and the length in the pants aren’t for a 6’6” person…. Finally a normal sized length … The material is soft and it just looks classy … something nice to fly in and arrive at the hotel!

Ordered this not knowing how quality the fabic is! Pleasantly surprised that it’s heavy enough to look great, but is still very comfy. The size is as expected and color is great - no fading after several washes. No wrinkles and looks great as loungewear or as a bit dressier for being out and about.

评论概述: Quality Material & Stitching, Great Casual Look
评论详情: I've never been disappointed with the Anrabess brand. It is quality clothing at a reasonable price. This two-piece set is no exception. I'm 5-4, 140 lbs, with a curvy figure. The size small fit perfectly, although the waistband was a bit tight when pulling it on over my hips. However, once it was on, the waistband was comfortable. The sleeve length is a bit long, with the sleeve hitting above just where my thumb meets my palm, but I like that, especially when it's cold out. The inseam length is perfect -- no need to hem the pants. The pants also feature side pockets, and the top has a half zip that you can unzip all the way and show off a tanktop underneath, or zip all the way up for added warmth. I got it in Navy, but have now ordered a Medium in Black, just to compare. Perfect for running errands or a remote work day.
The quality is wonderful. It fits a bit oversized which is what I like. The pockets are deep and the waistband is adjustable. The material is on the thicker side but it is stretchy.
These felt and fit like air essentials. I am 5’8 and 155 and got a medium.  Fit perfit not too small and not too big.

I purchased 2 colors.  I love it and get lots of compliments.  Runs big.  I ordered XS and I am 5’5” and 113lbs. The XS is still comfortably loose.  Material needs to be washed on gentle and hung dry or it may pill. Fabric is soft.
I really enjoyed the thickness of this material, it is true to size it washes really nice and worth every penny. I have ordered it in many colors.

I am 5’3” 110lbs . This set is very nice quality, unfortunately for me the XS is still too big. you can see the waist fits me above belly button touching my ribs. sleeves are long not as much as pants length. Is cozy and will keep it but will have to take it to get it fix.
Soft Comfortable and the wide legs allow for sleek modern look. I loved the loose fit yet fits perfectly in all the right places.

Ordered Carmel brown and a straight up orange showed up. Not the color in the pic at all. I am giving 4 stars because I already have it in black and love the set. Super soft and comfy so tried to ordered another one but def not the color in the pic. Def returning because of the color.

评论概述: Ordered one and loved it, ordered another and got socks?
评论详情: Yes you read that right. I ordered this set in black and LOVE IT. So I thought - let me grab the grey version to match my chucks. Waited and waited - there was actually a delivery delay - and when the package arrived it was 12 pairs of ankle socks. How in the world amazon? Was this an amazon picking error? How does a box of socks look like a two piece outfit?  Anyway - as for the set - they are great, fit true to size, are soft and light. Will be buying more, provided I get the actual item I ordered and not a 12 pack of socks.

I purchased this set hoping it was a dupe for a popular brand. The material is very heavy, seemed to be good quality. It definitely in not even close to the popular brand in the feel and fit of the fabric. I did really like the fit of the top, the bottom was far to big and not as long as I would like. (I'm 5'7"). However, it is a good buy for the price point. I ordered a medium and it is too big, I have returned but may try a small.

I'm 5'2 115 lbs. I bought a Small and it was much too big and too long. XS is perfect. The waistband is wide and tends to be a bit tight. They wash well, I don't dry them but I think you could. I bought light blue and navy. Stick with darker colors, however colors are true to the pictures. I would buy again.
So comfortable but too short. Great if you’re 5’6 and shorter. I’m 5’8 and the pants stop right above my ankles. I’m keeping them but probably will not order anymore.

Stylish, comfortable, and versatile, ANRABESS 2-piece outfits are perfect for lounging or casual outings. The soft, breathable fabric and relaxed fit ensure all-day comfort, while the trendy design adds a polished touch. A great wardrobe staple that’s easy to mix and match!
I LOVE THIS SO MUCH I AM BUYING ANOTHER IN A DIFFERENT COLOR. TRUE TO SIZE, GREAT QUALITY, AND IT LOOKS STYLISH.

I purchased the small as I’m 7 months pregnant, 5’6 120lbs. I’m usually an xs in most items however being so pregnant I figured the small would be more conducive to my expansion. But the small is huge! Material is nice so I returned the small and ordered the xs.

评论概述: Beautiful color and feel - light color pants a bit see through
评论详情: I started a return for this item, but loved the color and feel of the top so much that I cancelled. I am 5'3" 120lbs and a typical size small. I read reviews and ordered xs. Fit was good, though I agree with other reviewers ,the top was larger than the bottoms, which I liked.  The apricot color is very sheer and the pants are a bit hard to pull off. You can see the pockets through the front material on your thighs, and your backside is on display. I have a long waist so require a high rise, which I think sometimes makes pants show off my backside more than most. So perhaps not as much of an issue for everyone. I'm going to keep and probably wear separately as together they are a bit too big to feel cute.  I have a long waist and short legs and loved the length of the pants and the high rise of the waist. If I could redo my order, I think I would love them in a darker color.
This is the best outfit that I’ve seen in a long time. It fits well and the material is great.
I loved the first set so much that I ordered another. I am 5’7” and 157 and the large fits me perfectly. Very warm and cozy on these cold winter days.
Love the fabric and feel. Perfect as a work from home lounge set! Very chic. Fit is oversized. Very well made. Not too thin, not too thick.

the fabric is very soft  and super cozy, yet substantial.  The style and particularly the collar on the top is very attractive.  However, I wear Petite size and ordered the XS in this product and it is too large.
Size was to small
Ordered this as a present for my mom for Xmas and she loved it!  Amazing fit and she loved the way it felt!  My grandma wanted two ordered for her as soon as she saw how amazing my mom looked in it!
I was very pleased with the quality . I had to return because it was too large. I am between size medium and large which is usually size 12-14.  I found the outfit was very large one me.

This set is absolute perfection. Super soft and well constructed. Fabric is cozy but not too heavy. I got a small and it fits perfectly (normally wear a medium). I’m 5’2” and pants are the perfect length. I could not love it more and plan to buy in another color asap.
Great material,  looks very expensive , comfortable,  excellent for travel. Comfortable, true to size, great material.

Loved everything about this cozy set. Can be worn lounging around the house or going out for a casual look.  Great quality and the material is light and soft. This runs true to size. Will definitely be buying more in other colors 10/10

评论用户: These were garbage. The material is really awful. String coming out from the seams. I should have taken pictures. I promise these are garbage, do not buy!
评论详情: This is a nice set. I like the material and texture. I do think it will pill after a few washes if you put it in the dryer. I originally bought a large because I wanted the top to be really baggy, but the pants were way to big so I returned for a medium.the pants are still kind of too big, because they're so long, but the top is actually a better size, still baggy, but not like I'm swimming in it.
Had to return it because a small was too big for my wife. Great quality. I would highly recommend.
I got these for my sister for Christmas and she loves them because they're comfortable and she can wear them in or out of the house.

I’m 5’8” 140 lb. I ordered M. Pants were good length but waist was pressing on my belly. Top was very baggy and sleeves were too long and I have long hands. Overall made me look boxy. And was not flattering on me. But quality was great.

评论概述: True to size .  5 foot five 145 purchased a medium.
评论详情: Beautiful fabric for this two piece outfit love it love it love it definitely would buy again. Matter fact I bought it in white also.
I’m 5’9” and the legs were a bit high. Material is good quality though

I absolutely love this set. I’m 5’0”, 105 lbs and ordered an x-small. The pants are slightly long but otherwise the fit is great. Super comfy and the material is great quality. Just ordered in another color.
I love this lounge set, so soft and comfortable. Did size down from my recommended size and am glad I did. Fits perfect. Will buy in other colors.

评论概述: Great quality for a great price
评论详情: The fabric was way better than I expected. The material is heavier than the Spanx air essentials but not too heavy. It is very flattering.

I just love this set. It’s thick but fluid scuba fabric. Heather grey is Gorg! I’m am 135lb and 5’4” and I am wearing a M. It’s a little long but I roll up the waistband . Waistband is a lil snug but comfortable.

This is soft, well made and very comfortable.  I'm going to buy more.  The only drawback is why do MANUFACTURERS have to stitch in a small tag on the outside seam of pant leg?  You can't cut it out of the seam and it just irritates the skin the whole time.  I also like the wide waistband with some control in it.

评论概述: material is a bit stiff, pants are too short, top is great
评论详情: Overall a nice outfit but the pants are too short on me and the material looks stiff in the pants. I'm 5'6", weigh 140 lbs, chest 34C and usually wear size 8-10 or Medium. I ordered medium. The top is GREAT and totally worth it, the pants are too short and the bottom hem flops around when I walk. Maybe it will soften up once I wash them. I like the top and pair it with other pants and jeans. I bought navy blue, good color for me.

I bought this for myself & after many compliments when I wear it to the extreme comfortable material & fit, I bought this set for a Christmas gift. The recipient was super-excited to receive it. It looks and feels much more expensive than it is. I love it!

I have both this set and the similar one from Spanx. This one looks put together but the fabric used in the spanx set is much nicer. Specifically, the Spanx set is softer, lighter in weight and packs smaller  I will probably wear the Amazon set mostly at home and for busy errand days, and the Spanx one for travel and casual gatherings.
Fit a little big. Wish I would have sized down. Very soft and comfortable.

I have this cute and comfy set in three colors - black, apricot, and now "caramel." My opinion is that they run a wee bit large (I'm usually a medium and had to reorder in small) and I do have a small warning about the caramel color. It's not like the color shown. It's more of a burnt orange, which is okay if you're a University of Texas fan, which I am, but I was expecting it to be more on the brown side. I'm keeping it but I  wish I had just ordered the brown color.
Actually bought this as a gift

This is very comfortable and has pockets!!!  Easy on and off.  I would have given it a 5, but it's just a little short waisted and short for me.  I'm 5'8" and would prefer a little more length.  The middle hits above my waist by a couple of inches so I find myself constantly tugging down with the pockets.
This set is great quality and super soft and comfortable.  I love it!  I want to buy it in more colors.

I ordered two of these and after wearing one for only an hour, I was swimming in it. I am going to exchange the unworn set for one size smaller and hope that it isn't too big. Other than that, this is very cute, feels great on and looks crisp for just being casual sweats to throw on in a pinch. Cute with a down/puffer vest or coat and sneakers.

I love this brand. Everything I have purchased from them has been great quality, including this set. I'm 5' 4" and purchased a medium. The pants do come all the way to the floor. I wore a pair of platform Converse with this set and it worked great. Any shoes that are not that tall would likely require a little bit of hemming to make sure the pants didn't drag the ground. Overall, I'm extremely pleased with this outfit.

评论概述: Yes it’s the TikTok one, lovely but very long and large
评论详情: TT;DR: It’s buttery soft and flattering but made for tallies only! I know this is intended to be loose fitting but the sleeves are just comically long. Note that it’s not made for anyone under 5’3 and even then, hard to wear with sneakers. It’s buttery soft and flattering. I could wear it with leggings underneath to stay warm or keep it as is in fall/spring because it’s a very cool and breathable material. The apricot (pictured) is a peachy shade, the white and black are accurate. I *loved* it but it’s just not a good fit on my 5’1, 135 lb frame.
I love this set.. perfect pink and the softest material!!! Buy today!!!
Super cute and comfy, but the elastic waist was very wide and tight. Pants fit perfectly everywhere else, but I can’t stand tight waist. Sadly had to return. I’m

评论详情: Quality is ok . Just too large will return
Great, soft material. Nice and thick for winter. Very comfortable- looking to buy more in different colors! Fits true to size.
Great quality and so soft. Will be ordering another one. Petite friendly
Warm, washed well and holds its form and fit after washing.  Runs true to size.  Good quality fabric !
These are the softest material ever with the exception of silk! Ultra comfortable. I ordered another pair in a different color!
Super soft and comfortable for lounging around the house and cite and stylish enough to wear on a casual day off.
This set is very nice! It is comfortable and flattering. It doesn’t look like a couch potato outfit! Appropriate for shopping, traveling, any activity actually. Doesn’t wrinkle, washes well.
Supper soft!! Love the fit, only wish it was fleece lined!
Love everything about it. The fit the feel in general everything.
Medium is a great fit for 5’5” and 140 lbs. very soft fabric. Feels luxurious and more expensive than it is.
I love my warmups. I have in three colors and perfect for the cold weather. Great fit and look stylish.
The set is good quality, soft and love the color

Love this outfit. It’s so soft and heavy, stretchy fabric, perfect for cold days lounging or running  out to the store. I bought a small and I’m 5’2” and 150lbs. It fits good… I’m a little thick in the thighs and it’s a little firm fitting through that area. I’m small on top so the top fits very loose. If i would have ordered at medium it would have been too big on top. The length is actually good for me and everything is usually super long.
So comfortable and will purchase again in a different color.
